Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Series: Optix
Model: G281UV
Part Number: G281UV
Cabinet Color: Metallic Black


Display
Screen Size: 28"
Widescreen: Yes
Glare Screen: Non-glare
Panel: IPS
Display Type: UHD
Adaptive Sync Technology: FreeSync (AMD Adaptive Sync)
Recommended Resolution: 3840 x 2160 (4K)
Viewing Angle: 178° (H) / 178° (V)
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 300 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio: 1,000:1
Response Time: 1ms (MPRT) / 4ms (GTG)
Display Colors: 1.07 Billion
Pixel Pitch: 0.16mm
Refresh Rate: 60 Hz
VESA Certified DisplayHDR: DisplayHDR 400
Curved Surface Screen: Flat Panel


Connectivity
Video Ports: 1 x DisplayPort 1.2 / 2 x HDMI 2.0


Power
Power Consumption: Power On: 65W
Power Saving/Off: <0.5W


Convenience
Stand Adjustments: Tilt: -5° ~ 20°
VESA Compatibility - Mountable: 100 x 100mm
Features: 4K High Resolution - Enjoy the extreme fluid gaming and astonishing details with 4K (3840 x 2160) resolution.
IPS Panel - Optimize screen colors and brightness to enhance your viewing experience.
LESS BLUE LIGHT PREMIUM - LESS BLUE LIGHT Premium is using a hardware solution to reduced light emissions in the blue-violet segment of the blue light spectrum (wavelengths of 415 to 455 nm).
HDR400 + 10 bits - It has passed the VESA HDR Display 400 Certification, meaning it can provide a display with the most realistic colors.
Wide Color Gamut - Game colors and details will look more realistic and refined.
Night Vision - Get the jump on enemies before they even notice you.
Frameless design - Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience with super narrow bezels.
Anti-Flicker and Less Blue Light - Game even longer and prevent eye strain and fatigue.
178° Wide Viewing Angle - Colors and details will stay sharp at more angles with a 178° wide viewing angle.
AMD FreeSync Technology - Tear free, stutter free, fluid gaming.


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions (H x W x D): 17.58" x 25.12" x 2.30" w/o stand
17.58" x 25.12" x 9.03" w/ stand
Weight: 12.57 lbs.
